review: This is so great and easy to use.  I've showed it off to all who come to the house or when we are traveling. The connection and set up is a snap for anyone.  As I have been a long time Prime customer I don't seem to have the problem mentioned by others on separating the free from the charged programs.  Great Job Amazon !!!
author: Linndell Scarbrough

review: My order shipped quickly and was at my door before I knew it.  The packaging was frustration free as promised and the Fire TV is sleek and cool looking.  I didn't think I was going to be impressed on the look and feel of this product but I was.I am not the most tech savvy so I was super surprised how easy this was to hook up to my TV and get started.  I also purchased the Amazon Basic High-Speed HDMI cable; totoaly worth it. I had the Fire TV hooked up and a movie playing within minutes, even my husband was so impressed that I was able to get this up and running so quickly!  It is also super easy to find what you want to watch. There is a cool tutorial that walks you through the whole set up.Totally reccomend for all TV and Movie junkies!
author: Ligure

review: I'm a netflix user and the Netflix app tends to lag or buffer much more through Fire TV than if I stream from mu iPad. I hope Amazon addresses this soon because it is convenient to have one device plugged into my TV. As it stands now I get frustrated with the Fire and unplug it and use my iPad without issue.
